stanza.line: Not marble nor the gilded monumentsmonuments
Of princes shall outlive this powerful rhymerhyme
But you shall shine more bright in these contentscontents
Than unswept stone besmeared with sluttish timetime
When wasteful war shall statues overturnoverturn
And broils root out the work of masonrymasonry
Nor Mars his sword nor war quick fire shall burnburn
The living record of your memorymemory
Shall you pace forth your praise shall still find roomroom
Even in the eyes of all posterityposterity
That wear this world out to the ending doomdoom
So till the judgment that your self arisearise
You live in this and dwell in lovers eyeseyes
